functionDecorators.name: attachDocument
functionDecorators.description: Attach cid of arbitrary documents used to arbitrate disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/serial of the dispute within this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _attachment
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the URI of the document being added.

parameterDecorators.name: _forwarder
parameterDecorators.description: address of contract forwarding meta tx.

functionDecorators.name: raiseDispute
functionDecorators.description: Raise a new dispute. modifiermodifier onlyMember (must be decoded first).

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - 0: project address, 1: task id (0 if none), 2: action disputeType, 3: action data, 5: ipfs cid of pdf - const types = ["address", "uint256", "uint8", "bytes", "bytes"].

parameterDecorators.name: _signature
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - hash of _data signed by the address raising dispute.

functionDecorators.name: resolveDispute
functionDecorators.description: Arbitrate a dispute & execute accompanying enforcement logic to achieve desired project state. modifier onlyAdmin.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid (serial) of the dispute in this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _judgement
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the URI hash of the document to be used to close the dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _ratify
parameterDecorators.description: bool - true if status should be set to accepted, and false if rejected.
